name: BOOST PANIC
description:
The Space Grand Prix has long been defined by the grace and elegance of its champions. Some legendary racers have even managed to navigate hazard-strewn courses without a single scratch on their ships.

But all that's gonna change. You invented BOOST technology and built a ship sturdy enough to slam into walls at high speeds, and it's time to haphazardly carom your way to victory! Just cross the finish line before your vehicle falls apart and you win. Prove you're fast enough and you may even spark a revolution in the space racing scene!

Controls: 

  • Left/Right Arrows: Steer
  • Z: BOOST
  • R: Quick reset level

Tips:

  • Don't let your health run out, or you lose! If you're low, heal up in the purple recharge zones.
  • Finish 3rd or better to advance to the next race. What challenge lies in wait for you after you finish the grand prix?

Info:

Made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020

Made in GM Studio 2.

Art and code written for the jam. Music was pre-existing

Code/some music by Jummbus/Elsewhere: https://twitter.com/Jummbus

Art/some music by Tomas Praestholm: https://twitter.com/TomasPraestholm

SFX made in JFXR: https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com
